Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class UpdateTurnMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.UpdateTurnMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class UpdateTurnMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
UpdateTurnMessage message, require to communicate the information regarding the next move to be performed by the player.

  • Constructor Details

    • UpdateTurnMessage

      public UpdateTurnMessage​(TurnEvents.StartupActions nextStartupMove, Player currentPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<Color.PlayerColor> playerColor)
      Constructor of the message UpdateTurnMessage, require to communicate the information regarding the next move to be performed by the player.
      Parameters:
      nextStartupMove - The next StartupActions to be performed by the player during the startup phase of the game.
      currentPlayer - The current player who must perform the specified move.
      playerColor - ArrayList of PlayerColor available to be chosen.

    • UpdateTurnMessage

      public UpdateTurnMessage​(Board boardCopy, java.lang.String lastMovePerformedBy, TurnEvents.Actions nextMove, Player currentPlayer, Worker currentWorker)
      Constructor of the message UpdateTurnMessage, require to communicate the information regarding the next move to be performed by the player.
      Parameters:
      boardCopy - A copy of the board to be shown at the players every turn.
      lastMovePerformedBy - Nickname of the player who performed the last move.
      nextMove - The next Actions to be performed by the player during the game.
      currentPlayer - The current player who must perform the specified move.
      currentWorker - The worker chose by the player to play with this turn.

      Returns:
